name: Recoil Fire
components: V, S, M (hoof shavings from a mule)
text: The target firearm suddenly fires of its own volition, even if it is unloaded, generating a recoil so great that the wielder or carrier of the firearm must scramble to hold onto it and becomes flat-footed until the start of his next turn. If the wielder is already flat-footed, he is instead knocked prone. If the firearm was loaded, that ammunition is wasted.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (骡子蹄子)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (物体)
text_zh:
目标火器会如同有自我意识一样突然走火发射，就算它压根没有装填弹药。

这次发射会造成巨大的后坐力，以至于持有者必须紧紧抓住不放，这会导致他直到下次行动前一直处于措手不及状态。

如果持有者已经措手不及，他则会摔倒。同时，如果目标火器已经装填了弹药，该弹药被浪费。
